attributes.action: abolish the surcharge to speeding fines that go before a court.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This surcharge will be added to all speeding fines which are levied by a court, and will be used to appoint domestic violence counsellors to help bring alleged cases of abuse to court.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
